Title: Ends the local option of towns and cities to prohibit the sale of alcohol; repealer
Summary: Ends the local option of towns and cities to prohibit the sale of alcohol.
LawCode: Rpld Art 9, add ยง132, ABC L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the alcoholic beverage control law, in relation to ending the local option of towns and cities to prohibit the sale of alcohol; and to repeal certain provisions of such law relating thereto
